titleStmt.title: Whereas at the Parliament holden in this kingdom in the twelfth year of the reign of King Edward the Fourth ... by the Lords Justices and Council, Mau. Eustace canc., Orrery.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Crook ... and are to be sold by Samuel Dancer ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first two lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
"Given at the Council-chamber in Dublin, the 24. day of March, 1661."
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
